about_the_game:
A 1v1 2D arena battler designed by avid MOBA players.

3 Factions. 16 characters. 78 unique abilities.

This game is ideal for those who wish you could be every one of your teammates. It is ideal for those who enjoy combat with breaks between, and for those who derive satisfaction from figuring out different matchups.

The factions:
  • Ice: A mix of gifted humans who use resources efficiently.
  • Cave: Goatish guerrilla warriors control the board and carefully pick fights to defend their cave.
  • Demon: A war band of disfigured creatures who use brute force to conquer.

Welcome to Braga.
A harsh, unpredictable planet of subtle magic and ancient secrets.
Goat people have lived here since time was. Decades ago, exiled immortals arrived and their greed threatened the peaceful goats. These conquerers have been caught in a cycle of war, hunger and thirst, while the bountiful underground remains out of reach. An interplanetary expedition force of humans are drawn to the natural resources of Braga. In their desperate quest to survive the surface and escape the planet, humans unwittingly open the caves for the so-called demons. Braga is struck by its first world war.

Learning the Game


There is a much shorter learning curve for those familiar with MOBA or action RPG styles of combat. Because every piece on your board is different, it will be difficult at first to learn and play all individual pieces. The style of positioning is close to Chess. Your team is placed on a board, where you fight for resources to upgrade your pieces. Additionally, pieces on the board give arena bonuses to each other, making positioning affect the outcomes of fast arena fights.

Are you better than your friends?
